title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Visual Thinking-Based Mathematical Escape Game Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can develop at least three mathematical problem-solving scenarios using escape game design principles.
Learners can design and evaluate the logical structure of team-based escape games by applying visual thinking tools.
Learners achieve a 20% improvement in math concept application ability and a 15% enhancement in collaborative competencies through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
